title: Ep. 50 | Plant Medicine Ceremony: What to Know & Expect with Dr. Ellen Vora & Dr. Tanmeet Sethi, Part 2 of 2
author: Avanti Kumar-Singh
description: Dr. Tanmeet Sethi and Dr. Ellen Vora share what you can expect at a sacred plant medicine ceremony, plus insight into finding treatments and practitioners. Plus, they unpack the power of healing community in part two of this conversation on pyschedelics and plant medicine.
cleaned_text: Medicine Ceremony: What to Know & Expect with Dr. Ellen Vora & Dr. Tanmeet Sethi, Part 2 of 2 Welcome back for Part 2 of Dr. Avanti's conversation with a board-certified psychiatrist, Dr. Ellen Vora, and board-certified integrative physician, Dr. Tanmeet Sethi. Today, you'll learn what to expect from a sacred plant medicine ceremony, and why surrendering to your experience can invoke the deepest healing. They also give insight into finding places for treatment and practitioners. If you haven't already listened, be sure to check out part 1, [Ceremonial & Therapeutic Power of Psychedelic Medicine](https://www.avantikumarsingh.com/podcast-content/ceremonial-therapeutic-power-of-psychedelic-medicine-with-dr-ellen-vora-dr-tanmeet-sethi-part-1)! SUBSCRIBE FOR FREE ON: Powered by [RedCircle](https://redcircle.com?utm_source=rc_embedded_player&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=embedded_v1) Today on The Healing Catalyst: What a sacred plant medicine ceremony is What to expect if you participate in ceremony Surrendering to your experience during ceremony Who can benefit from this medicine How to find a place for treatment & what to know about finding a practitioner The future of these psychedelic & plant medicines Resources: Leave a voice message for Avanti: " [Ask Me Anything](https://bit.ly/3MbcaSW)" [Sign-up to be a member of The Healing Catalyst Collective](https://bit.ly/3v12LWv)and access resources for this episode. Follow Psychiatry for Mental Dr. Tanmeet Sethi](https://www.avantikumarsingh.com/podcast-content/reframing-suffering-through-gratitude-with-dr-tanmeet-sethi) Connect with Dr. Avanti: Kumar-Singh, is an Ayurveda Wellness Expert on a mission to show how Ayurveda is a health catalyst to achieve optimal wellness in modern life. Over the two decades of her training, study, and research, Dr. Kumar-Singh has shared her expertise with Fortune 500 companies, at elite undergraduate and graduate institutions, and at prestigious industry and medical conferences. She has been featured in the Huffington Post, goop, Thrive Global and mindbodygreen, and served as the co-lead facilitator of the Faculty Scholars Program in Integrative Healthcare at the OSHER Center for Integrative Medicine at Northwestern Medicine. Dr. Kumar-Singh is also the author of [The Health Catalyst](https://www.amazon.com/Health-Catalyst-Ayurveda-Self-Heal-Wellness/dp/1734657227/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=avanti+kumar+singh&qid=1597094755&sr=8-1). The Content is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.
